text: Robert Michael O'Hare, Jr. (May 6, 1952 â€“ September 28, 2012) was an American movie, stage, and television actor. He was known for his role as Jeffrey Sinclair on the television series Babylon 5. O'Hare was born on May 6, 1952 in Chicago, Illinois. He studied at the Juillard School and at Harvard Universty. O'Hare died on September 28, 2012 from a heart attack at age 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1952 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Michael O'Hare
